org.eclipse.scada.core.client

Interface ConnectionStateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoReconnectController, ConnectionAnalyzer, ConnectWaitController, DumpingStateListener, EventManager, FolderManager, ItemManagerImpl, MonitorManager, NotifyConnectionErrorListener, ProxySubConnection

    public interface ConnectionStateListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void stateChange(Connection connection, ConnectionState state, java.lang.Throwable error)
      Notify a state change

    • Method Detail

      • stateChange

        void stateChange(Connection connection,
               ConnectionState state,
               java.lang.Throwable error)
        Notify a state change
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection that changed
        state - the new state of the connection
        error - some error information that lead to the new state (can be null if it was not an error)
